title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 3582/84 of 19 December 1984 fixing the amount of the carry-over premium for certain fishery products for the 1985 fishing year
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 3582/84
of 19 December 1984
fixing the amount of the carry-over premium for certain fishery products for the 1985 fishing year
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body: For the 1985 fishing year, the carry-over premium for the products listed in Annex I to Regulation (EEC) No 2203/82 shall be as indicated in the Annex.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 January 1985.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 19 December 1984.
For the Commission
Giorgios CONTOGEORGIS
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 379, 31. 12. 1981, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 235, 10. 8. 1982, p. 4.
(3) See page 43 of this Official Journal.
ANNEX
Amount of the premium
